Address.name: Address
Address.description: A physical address for shipping or billing

fields.name: isDefault
fields.description: Whether this is the default address

AddressBook.name: AddressBook
AddressBook.description: Collection of user addresses with labels

fields.name: addresses
fields.description: All addresses in the address book

AddToCartInput.name: AddToCartInput
AddToCartInput.description: Input for adding item to cart

fields.name: variantId
fields.description: Variant ID (required if product has variants)

CartItem.name: CartItem
CartItem.description: An item in the shopping cart

Category.name: Category
Category.description:
Product category with hierarchical structure

Categories form a tree structure and contain products.
**Circular Reference:** Category -> Product -> Category

fields.name: breadcrumb
fields.description: Full path from root (e.g., "Electronics > Phones > Smartphones")

fields.name: products
fields.description: Products in this category (circular reference with Product.category)

fields.name: productCount
fields.description: Total number of products in this category (including subcategories)

fields.name: field
fields.description: Field that caused the error (if applicable)

CheckoutResult.name: CheckoutResult
CheckoutResult.description: Possible results of a checkout operation

fields.name: isPercentage
fields.description: Whether this is a percentage discount

CreateProductInput.name: CreateProductInput
CreateProductInput.description: Input for creating a new product

CreateUserInput.name: CreateUserInput
CreateUserInput.description: Input for creating a new user account

DateTime.name: DateTime
DateTime.description: A date-time string in ISO 8601 format (e.g., "2024-01-15T09:30:00Z")

Float.name: Float
Float.description: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

Int.name: Int
Int.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

InventoryInfo.name: InventoryInfo
InventoryInfo.description:
Inventory information for a product variant

This type demonstrates deep nesting: Product -> Variant -> Inventory -> Warehouse -> Region

LabeledAddress.name: LabeledAddress
LabeledAddress.description: An address with a user-defined label

fields.name: isDefaultShipping
fields.description: Whether this is the default shipping address

fields.name: isDefaultBilling
fields.description: Whether this is the default billing address

Moderatable.name: Moderatable
Moderatable.description: Interface for content that can be moderated

fields.name: isApproved
fields.description: Whether the content has been approved by moderators

fields.name: moderatedBy
fields.description: The moderator who reviewed this content

Money.name: Money
Money.description: A monetary amount represented as a string with currency precision (e.g., "19.99")

Notification.name: Notification
Notification.description: A notification sent to a user

fields.name: target
fields.description: The target entity this notification is about

fields.name: isRead
fields.description: Whether the notification has been read

NotificationTarget.name: NotificationTarget
NotificationTarget.description: The target of a notification - what the notification is about

NotificationType.name: NotificationType
NotificationType.description: Types of notifications sent to users

Order.name: Order
Order.description:
A customer order

Orders track the purchase lifecycle from cart to delivery.
**Circular Reference:** Order -> User -> Orders

fields.name: customer
fields.description: Customer who placed the order (circular reference)

OrderEvent.name: OrderEvent
OrderEvent.description: An event in the order timeline

fields.name: actor
fields.description: User who triggered the event (if applicable)

OrderItem.name: OrderItem
OrderItem.description: A line item in an order

fields.name: unitPrice
fields.description: Price per unit at time of order

fields.name: totalPrice
fields.description: Total price for this line item

OrderItemCustomization.name: OrderItemCustomization
OrderItemCustomization.description: Customization applied to an order item

OrderStatus.name: OrderStatus
OrderStatus.description: The lifecycle status of an order

values.name: PENDING
values.description: Order has been placed but not yet processed

values.name: PROCESSING
values.description: Order is being prepared for shipment

PageInfo.name: PageInfo
PageInfo.description: Pagination information following the Relay spec

fields.name: hasNextPage
fields.description: Whether there are more items after

fields.name: hasPreviousPage
fields.description: Whether there are more items before

PaymentMethod.name: PaymentMethod
PaymentMethod.description: Payment methods accepted by the platform

values.name: CRYPTO
values.deprecationReason: Crypto payments will be removed in v2.0. Use CARD or PAYPAL instead.

PaymentPending.name: PaymentPending
PaymentPending.description: Returned when payment is still processing

fields.name: shippingAddressId
fields.description: Shipping address ID or new address

fields.name: shippingAddress
fields.description: New shipping address (if not using existing)

fields.name: billingAddressId
fields.description: Billing address ID or new address

fields.name: billingAddress
fields.description: New billing address (if not using existing)

Product.name: Product
Product.description:
A product available for purchase

Products belong to categories and can have multiple variants (size, color, etc.).
Each product tracks inventory and pricing information.

fields.name: compareAtPrice
fields.description: Original price before discount (if on sale)

fields.name: isOnSale
fields.description: Whether product is currently on sale

fields.name: category
fields.description:
Product category (creates circular reference)
Category contains a list of products, and each product references its category

fields.name: additionalCategories
fields.description: Additional categories this product belongs to

fields.name: isInStock
fields.description: Whether any variant is in stock

ProductSortField.name: ProductSortField
ProductSortField.description: Fields available for sorting product listings

ProductSpecification.name: ProductSpecification
ProductSpecification.description: A key-value specification for a product

ProductStatus.name: ProductStatus
ProductStatus.description: Product availability status in the catalog

values.name: OUT_OF_STOCK
values.description: Product is temporarily out of stock

values.name: HIDDEN
values.description: Product listing is hidden from customers

ProductVariant.name: ProductVariant
ProductVariant.description: A specific variant of a product (e.g., "Large, Blue")

fields.name: inventory
fields.description: Inventory information - contains warehouse details (deep nesting)

fields.name: isAvailable
fields.description: Whether this variant is available for purchase

ProductVariantInput.name: ProductVariantInput
ProductVariantInput.description: Input for creating a product variant

Region.name: Region
Region.description:
A geographic region for shipping and warehousing

This is the deepest level of nesting in the Product hierarchy.

Review.name: Review
Review.description:
A product review written by a user

**Circular Reference:** Review -> User -> Reviews
**Circular Reference:** Review -> Product -> Reviews

fields.name: author
fields.description: The user who wrote the review (circular reference)

fields.name: isVerifiedPurchase
fields.description: Whether reviewer is a verified purchaser

fields.name: helpfulCount
fields.description: Number of users who found this helpful

fields.name: unhelpfulCount
fields.description: Number of users who found this unhelpful

ReviewReply.name: ReviewReply
ReviewReply.description: A reply to a review (typically from seller)

fields.name: isSellerResponse
fields.description: Whether this is an official seller response

SearchResult.name: SearchResult
SearchResult.description: Result of a search query - can return products, users, or categories

SEOMetadata.name: SEOMetadata
SEOMetadata.description: SEO metadata for products and pages

SoftDeletable.name: SoftDeletable
SoftDeletable.description:
Interface for entities that can be soft-deleted

Entities implementing this interface are never permanently deleted
but instead marked as deleted with a timestamp.

fields.name: deletedAt
fields.description: When the entity was deleted, null if not deleted

fields.name: isDeleted
fields.description: Whether the entity is currently deleted

String.name: String
String.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

Timestamped.name: Timestamped
Timestamped.description:
Base interface for all entities with timestamps

All database entities implement this interface to provide
consistent timestamp tracking.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: When the entity was last updated

UpdateCartItemInput.name: UpdateCartItemInput
UpdateCartItemInput.description: Input for updating cart item quantity

User.name: User
User.description:
A registered user of the platform

Users can be customers, sellers, or administrators. Each user has a profile,
can place orders, write reviews, and manage their wishlist.

**Circular Reference:** User -> Order -> User (orderBy)
**Circular Reference:** User -> Review -> User (author)

fields.name: addresses
fields.description:
User's shipping addresses
@deprecated Use `addressBook` instead for better address management
fields.deprecationReason: Use `addressBook` instead for better address management

fields.name: addressBook
fields.description: User's address book with labeled addresses

fields.name: orders
fields.description: Orders placed by this user (creates circular reference with Order.customer)

fields.name: reviews
fields.description: Reviews written by this user (creates circular reference with Review.author)

fields.name: totalSpent
fields.description: Total amount spent by this user

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: When the user was last updated

fields.name: deletedAt
fields.description: When the user was deleted (soft delete)

fields.name: isDeleted
fields.description: Whether the user account is deleted

UserProfile.name: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Extended profile information for a user

fields.name: marketingOptIn
fields.description: Whether user has opted into marketing emails

UserRole.name: UserRole
UserRole.description: User role determining access levels and permissions

values.name: SELLER
values.description: Seller with ability to list products

values.name: SUPPORT
values.description: Support staff with limited admin capabilities

UserStatus.name: UserStatus
UserStatus.description: The current status of a user account

values.name: ACTIVE
values.description: User account is active and in good standing

values.name: BANNED
values.description: User account has been permanently banned

values.name: PENDING_VERIFICATION
values.description: User account is pending email verification

UUID.name: UUID
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier in UUID v4 format

VariantOption.name: VariantOption
VariantOption.description: A single option for a variant (e.g., "Size: Large")

WarehouseStock.name: WarehouseStock
WarehouseStock.description: Stock information at a specific warehouse

fields.name: canFulfill
fields.description: Whether this location can fulfill orders
